content.rendered:
Install Bibledit on macOS

This assumes a standard installation of the operating system.

  1. Install Bibledit from the App Store
  2. Open Bibledit.
  3. Connect to Bibledit Cloud via menu Settings / Cloud.
  4. Give it enough time to download all the data from Bibledit Cloud.
  5. Bibledit is ready for online and offline use.

Home
Review
